transcript: Elon Musk can tweet on the toilet and be like I'm on the throne taking a and it'll get a million likes why because it's Elon Musk and he's the richest man in the world and owns three of the biggest companies that are most Innovative of all time if you were to go post that it wouldn't work and so if you're like I want to analyze Elon musk's content strategy his content strategy is being Elon Musk the message is 10% of how people consume it 90% is the context around the message
